[[Image:XnView Screenshot.png|thumb|right|250px|[[XnView]], a popular [[cross-platform]] image viewer]]
An '''image viewer''' or '''image browser''' is a [[computer program]] that can displays stored graphical [[image]]; it can often handle various [[graphics file format]]s. Such software usually renders the image according to properties of the display such as [[color depth]] and [[display resolution]].
